segments.text: What was the movie you saw last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a foreign film called ' Gone with the wind ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I've seen that movie , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you like the movie ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought it was pretty good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're kidding . The storyline and acting were outstanding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I expected too much from the movie , so I was a bit disappointed .
segments.speaker: S2
